dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6161 IH: Supporting Access to Vital and Affordable Care for Everyone Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Molinaro (for himself, Ms. Pettersen, Mr. LaHood, Mr. Carey, Mr. Trone, and Mr. Pappas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow amounts paid for over-the-counter naloxone to be taken into account in determining the deduction for medical expenses.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supporting Access to Vital and Affordable Care for Everyone Act of 2023 or as the SAVE Act of 2023.

section.header: Amounts paid for over-the-counter naloxone taken into account in determining the deduction for medical expenses

subsection.text: Section 213(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by inserting or naloxone after insulin.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years ending after the date of the enactment of this Act.
